Detailed Description

A related word request.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) init

Initialize a new related word request.

All available related words will be returned.

- (id) initWithRelationTypes: (NSSet *)  relationTypes

Create and initialize a new related word request for the given relation types.

Parameters:
relationTypesThe relation types for which related words should be returned, or nil if all related words should be returned.
- (id) initWithRelationTypes: (NSSet *)  relationTypes
maxResultCount: (NSInteger)  maxResultCount 

Create and initialize a new related word request for the given relation types.

Parameters:
relationTypesThe relation types for which related words should be returned, or nil if all related words should be returned.
maxResultCountThe maximum number of related words to return, or WNUnlimitedResultLength to return all available words.
- (id) initWithRelationTypes: (NSSet *)  relationTypes
partsOfSpeech: (NSSet *)  partsOfSpeech
dictionary: (WNDictionary *)  dictionary
maxResultCount: (NSInteger)  maxResultCount 

Initialize a new related word request.

Parameters:
relationTypesThe relation types for which related words should be returned, or nil if all related words should be returned.
partsOfSpeechThe parts of speech for which related words should be returned, or nil if all related words should be returned.
dictionaryThe dictionary to consult, or nil if all available dictionaries should be consulted.
maxResultCountThe maximum number of related words to return, or WNUnlimitedResultLength to return all available words.
+ (id) request

Create and initialize a new related word request.

All available related words will be returned.

+ (id) requestWithMaxResultCount: (NSInteger)  maxResultCount

Create and initialize a new related word request with the provided maximum result count.

All available related words, within to the supplied result limit, will be returned.

Parameters:
maxResultCountThe maximum number of related words to return, or WNUnlimitedResultLength to return all available words.
+ (id) requestWithRelationTypes: (NSSet *)  relationTypes

Create and initialize a new related word request for the given relation types.

Parameters:
relationTypesThe relation types for which related words should be returned, or nil if all related words should be returned.
+ (id) requestWithRelationTypes: (NSSet *)  relationTypes
maxResultCount: (NSInteger)  maxResultCount 

Create and initialize a new related word request for the given relation types.

Parameters:
relationTypesThe relation types for which related words should be returned, or nil if all related words should be returned.
maxResultCountThe maximum number of related words to return, or WNUnlimitedResultLength to return all available words.
+ (id) requestWithRelationTypes: (NSSet *)  relationTypes
partsOfSpeech: (NSSet *)  partsOfSpeech
dictionary: (WNDictionary *)  dictionary
maxResultCount: (NSInteger)  maxResultCount 

Create and initialize a new related word request.

Parameters:
relationTypesThe relation types for which related words should be returned, or nil if all related words should be returned.
partsOfSpeechThe parts of speech for which related words should be returned, or nil if all related words should be returned.
dictionaryThe dictionary to consult, or nil if all available dictionaries should be consulted.
maxResultCountThe maximum number of related words to return, or WNUnlimitedResultLength to return all available words.
